viralPosts.text:
I’m one of 20 million+ people in the U.S. living with #LongCOVID.
This fight isn’t just personal—it’s part of a long struggle for health justice in a nation that’s never been healthy for all.

My new @Truthout piece:
👉 truthout.org/articles/i-a...

#DisabilityJustice #HealthEquity #PublicHealth

viralPosts.text:
I'm excited to share that Art of Fauna is nominated for the Special Jury Prize of the Deutscher Entwicklerpreis! 🥳

Both because of its accessibility and the giving back initiative, where 20% of all proceeds are donated to nature preservation! 🦆
#indiedev #a11y
